dublin_core.dcvalue: SMART is an SMS printer technology that is used for early infant diagnosis of HIV/AIDS. The small battery operated printers allow health facilities to receive and print early infant diagnosis test results without the need for computers or waiting for hard copies to be delivered, thus reducing time between HIV testing and patients recieving results.
Rosemary Archibong, Senior Program Officer, CHAI Nigeria, Email: rarchibong@clintonhealthaccess.org | Frances Gonzales, Program Associate, mHealth Alliance, Email: fgonzales@mhealthalliance.org
